mapper.insert: insert into sys_role(role_name, remark, create_user_id, create_time) values(#{role_name}, #{remark}, #{create_user_id}, now())
mapper.update: update sys_role set role_name = #{role_name}, remark = #{remark}, create_user_id = #{create_user_id}, create_time = now() where role_id = #{role_id}
mapper.select: SELECT r.role_name FROM sys_role r LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{user_id}
